about_the_game:
After the recent but quick spread of a mysterious zombie virus, the world has collapsed. Luckily you, Dr. J. Ferret, were able to develop a wonder cure in small doses capable of reversing the apocalypse. By restoring humanity and rebuilding your lab maybe we stand a chance. Can you reclaim the living before it's too late?

Zombie Curing Roguelike

You can expect a roguelike gameplay experience where you are racing to apply the cure faster than the zombie virus can spread. By rescuing those you can, you'll be rewarded with a variety of upgrades to improve your abilities and keep going! But be warned... the virus seems to be mutating so be prepared to face tougher challenges as time goes on!

Cure Humanity and lead them to safety

Once you're able to cure some of the infected, your next step is to lead them to safety. Free medical care and bodyguard services? Surely, they'll show you their gratitude.

All the upgrades for your cure dispensing needs

You're gonna need everything you can get your hands on to reclaim the living and save humanity. Pick from a wide array of upgrades to grow faster, stronger and get the cure spreading among the horde!

Rebuild your lab and grow your arsenal to handle the horde

The zombie virus seems to be evolving... Your lab got pretty wrecked in the chaos of the outbreak but, with the extra hands of those you cure, you can rebuild your lab and get access to new and crazier upgrades!
